items.text: gets on top of the bounce and defends into the off side.
items.shortText: Chatara to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: works this off a length from outside off towards deep backward square leg.
items.shortText: Chatara to Imrul Kayes, 2 runs

items.text: works this off his hip to deep square leg.
items.postText: Syed Kabir: "This is the stage that separates top and bottom sides. It can be very easy for Zim to put their heads down staring at yet another agonizing defeat but they should know that a couple of wickets can put them right back in this against a depleted BD side not known for their chasing and prone to collapses."
items.shortText: Chatara to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: short ball outside off, Liton sways out of the way quite comfortably.
items.shortText: Chatara to Liton Das, no run

items.text: pulled to deep square where there's a boundary rider.
items.shortText: Chatara to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: driven into the gap at extra cover for an easy single.
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: squeezes this full delivery back to the bowler.
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: prods forward but plays down the wrong line, gets an inside edge onto the pad.
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: drifts into middle and leg, squeezed to short fine for a quick single.
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: works this down to long-on for an easy single.
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: squeezes the drive back to the bowler.
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: back of length outside off, he stands tall and punches to sweeper cover.
items.shortText: Chatara to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: slants a length ball across the left-hander, defended with soft hands.
items.shortText: Chatara to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: slower length ball on middle and leg, worked to deep square leg.
items.shortText: Chatara to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: slants one back in full, Liton shows the full face of the bat in defence.
items.shortText: Chatara to Liton Das, no run

items.text: too full, driven back down the ground, mid-on with a sliding stop to keep it down to a single.
items.shortText: Chatara to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: banged in short, Imrul ducks under this short delivery.
items.shortText: Chatara to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: drifts in a short delivery into the stumps, worked towards midwicket
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Liton Das, no run

items.text: wrists this into the wide long-on region, wanted two but a single is all they will get.
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: too full and angling in from round the stumps, driven back.
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: too short, sitting up nicely as he uses the width to thrash that to sweeper cover. Half-century off 57 balls for Imrul
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: too full, he makes room and then unfurls his wrists to drill this into the gap between the two cover fielders, top-notch stroke-making this from Liton.
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Liton Das, 2 runs

items.text: leading edge that rolls wide of mid-off as they jog a single.
items.postText: Just 20 overs into the innings and Bangladesh are already halfway there. Zimbabwe don't need just one wicket but a clutch of wickets to make a comeback from here.
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Liton Das, 1 run

items.preText: Mir's dil maange more : "Bangladeshi batsmen have continually struggled to convert 50's into 100's, look at all their key players, they have a lot of 50's but their conversion rate is poor. Would like to see these two knuckle down and get their centuries, they need to get into that mindset. It would strengthen the batting order with Tamim and Shakib coming back, and with the world cup fast approaching they need to have a settled top order with games under their belt."
items.text: scintillating drive that beats cover. A bullet drive that kept gathering more pace on this dewy outfield. Long-off had no chance despite an Usain Bolt-like dash. Stunning timing, magnificent placement.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Liton Das, FOUR runs

items.text: slides one into middle and leg, turned to deep square leg.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Liton Das, 1 run
